mapper.insert: INSERT INTO concustcontm( tenant_id, cust_id, cont_nm, valid_start_dt, valid_end_dt, cont_stat_cd, network_fg_cd, password_lod_cd, password_min_len, password_rnwl_cycl_cd, password_use_lmt_yn, password_pose_yn, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{custId}, #{contNm}, #{validStartDt}, #{validEndDt}, #{contStatCd}, #{networkFgCd}, #{passwordLodCd}, #{passwordMinLen}, #{passwordRnwlCyclCd}, #{passwordUseLmtYn}, #{passwordPoseYn}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp )
